org.orgName: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: STATE OF WASHINGTON COUNTY OF KING SS

BE IT KNOWN, that, on this 7th day of October A.D. 1915, before the undersigned, a Notary Public for Washington, duly commissioned and sworn, personally appeared FRANCIS STEPHEN MEDCRAF, John W. Rafferty and Grace H. Rafferty his wife and Elijah Le Roy Hollcroft and Marjorie A. Hollcroft his wife to me personally known to be the same persons named in and who executed the foregoing bond and they duly acknowledged to me that they executed the same freely and voluntarily and for the uses and purposes therein expressed.
Witnes my hand and official seal this 7th day of October A. D. 1915.
Geo D. Emery Notary Public for Washington Residing at Seattle.
STATE OF WASHINGTON COUNTY OF KING SS

John W. Rafferty and Grace H Rafferty his wife and Elijah Le Roy Hollcroft anf, Marjorie A. Hollcroft his wife being first duly sworn, doth say; that they are sureties name in and who executed the foregoing BOND; that they are residents and freeholders of the State of Washington and the respective communities which they comprise are each worth the sum of TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY DOLLARS, over and above their debts and liabilites and exclusive of their property exempt by law from sale on execution.
John W. Rafferty Grace H Rafferty. Elijah LeRoy Hollcroft Marjorie A Hollcroft.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 7th day of October A. D. 1915. Geo D. Emery Notary Public for Washington Residing at Seattle.
